data.title: Scoop - Full Cast & Crew
data.meta_description: Learn more about the full cast of Scoop with news, photos, videos and more at TV Guide
data.text:
48 Metascore

2006

1 hr 36 mins

Comedy

PG13

Watchlist

Where to Watch

There's murder, magic, mystery and romance afoot as writer-director Woody Allen heads to London for this beguiling and riotous whodunit. Allen is a magician who's recruited by an American journalism student (Scarlett Johansson) to help solve a crime after a ghost (Ian McShane) tells her that a British aristocrat (Hugh Jackman), with whom she may be falling in love, might actually be a murderer known as "The Tarot Card Killer." Charles Dance, Romola Garai, Julian Glover, Sam Friend.
